channel.title: The RuneFocus Revival - 317, 2006 attempt
channel.description:
Hello. As a lot of members know that I'm a 317 fanatic, I love everything that brings back memories about RuneScape. I already had an attempt to make a RS 2006 remake, which was going quite good and I lot of people loved that project when it got released. My first attempt was called [b]xEpicz[/b], you can check it out [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=514973.0]here[/url]. I don't care if some1'll say that rs 2007 came back, it doesn't matter for me. I found pleasure on coding servers and bringing back memories my way, so I would like a team that will work together and have fun while working on the project. Yes, I'm still working on the 194, for a couple of days it will be released. :)
Protocol: 317 Base: iClarity(for now) Client: 317 loading 459 gameframe (or standard 317)
[u][b]Apply:[/b][/u] Name: Java knowledge: Previous works(projects): Age: Country: Skype: Dropbox: Why you think you should be a part of the team:
Sorry if I misspelled something.

item.title: The RuneFocus Revival - 317, 2006 attempt
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Hello. As a lot of members know that I’m a 317 fanatic, I love everything that brings back memories about RuneScape. I already had an attempt to make a RS 2006 remake, which was going quite good and I lot of people loved that project when it got released. My first attempt was called xEpicz, you can check it out here. I don’t care if some1’ll say that rs 2007 came back, it doesn’t matter for me. I found pleasure on coding servers and bringing back memories my way, so I would like a team that will work together and have fun while working on the project. Yes, I’m still working on the 194, for a couple of days it will be released.
